runs.comm: good length outside off, opens the face and pushes to point
another length ball in the channel, Wright hopes across and steers to point again
touch shorter, Wright advances and plays an ungainly swipe across the line that misses
he connects this time, whipping a short delivery through midwicket for four, the first runs of the innings
pitched up on leg stump, clipped through backward square leg
length ball, coming in towards middle and leg, punched wide of mid-on, well placed and they'll get back for a couple
fullish, pitching in line and seaming further, hits Wright on the pad but Taufel shakes his head - going down leg
short ball and that's dumped all the way over deep midwicket, Wright saw it early and crumped a belligerent pull for six
length ball, slightly wide, Wright throws his hands and slices one to third man on the bounce
pitched up, on leg stump, Hales is stuck on the crease and hit on his standing leg
full and tailing in again, going past leg stump, Hales backs away, swipes and misses, the ball deflects to short third man
length ball on the stumps, hops away early and tries to cut through point, straight at the fielder
low, skiddy delivery on the stumps, worked into the leg side
rolls his fingers over this, slowing the ball down, Wright can only block ineffectually down on to the pitch

bit of width, slashed hard and straight to point! The ball was there to cut but Wright didn't manage to stay on top of it, still whacked it pretty hard though but Dilshan is just the guy you want the ball to fly to in such a situation and he snaps it up

full, an attempted toe-crusher from Malinga, blocked short on the leg side and Hales goes charging down the wicket, is told to go back by YJB and Malinga fields, hurls to the non-striker's end, Kulasekara can't grasp it though and England run the overthrows!
well, there's no doubt about this one, slapped high into the night sky, all height and no trousers, the ball plopping safely into the hands of mid-off

yorker, smashes Hales on the pad and gone! Three in the over for Malinga! It was full, fierce and practically growling as it reached Hales, who was almost knocked off his feet - Hawk Eye suggests it would have missed leg stump but there are no reprieves in this format and England are tumbling like nine pins
full, attempted yorker on leg stump, can't get bat on it and it thumps the pad
pitched up and swinging down the leg side, inside edge on to the pad this time
back of a length outside off and tapped into the covers
touch short of a length outside the line of off, steered behind point to get Patel off the mark
good length, angled across towards the top of off, blocked back down the wicket
another lbw appeal, might have been a inside edge as Morgan played back in front of the stumps
good length, fiddled towards mid-on for one
turned through midwicket, Jayawardene's slide confuses the man coming in off the rope but they still get just one
slower ball, pushed through outside off and Patel can only poke his rhubarb stick lamely, unsuccessfully
touch full, in the slot and Patel Battenbergs the back down the ground for six over long-on
sliding down the leg side, tries to flick, comes off the pad and rolls to square leg
bit of width and cut to point, who falls over in the process of fielding
overpitched outside off stump and driven handsomely through the covers for four
takes the pace off, foxes Patel who prods and misses
another slower ball, out the back of the hand, and Patel's light up like it's time for seconds, waits on it and carves over extra-cover for another boundary
length ball, sliding down the leg side, hit on the pad trying to turn to leg
outside the line of off and punched to point - dot ball
good length, Patel advances to narrow the gap and slaps hard, out of the meat, but straight at the fielder again
pushed through, bit of width and cut hard, there's a misfield and they get one
too short from Mendis, wide of the stumps, Patel back away and crashes a four in front of square on the off side
this one goes straight on outside off, thick-edged low to backward point
length ball in the channel, Patel rocks back again and thrashes a cut shot away to the fence - playing well, Patel
loses his line down the leg side this time
full toss and Patel doesn't miss out, crunching the ball over cover for his third boundary in the over! That brings up the fifty too
pushed through on leg stump, straightens a touch and played back down the pitch
overpitched outside off, Morgan lunges forward and pings a straight drive down the ground
length ball this time, on the stumps, driven to mid-off
full and on leg stump, Morgan digs it out but straight back to the bowler
pitched up on the stumps, Morgan whips his wrists through this but only succeeds in picking out midwicket
slower ball, on leg stump, Morgan shovels it down to long leg
full and outside the line of off, Patel leans out and pushes one into the covers
floated up on the stumps, backs away and chops to point
flighted around the line of off, again the batsman makes room and clumps in front of point, beats the infield for a single
tossed up outside off stump, stays back and steers through point
flighted, full and on middle and leg, Patel tries to big ole heave to cow corner but it trickles along the ground through midwicket
round the wicket, tossed up on leg stump, Morgan blocks into the off side
full and on the stumps, Morgan leaves the crease and works a couple through the leg side
short and wide and carved over point with a big swing of the forearms
Samit is really tucking in to the magician here, stepping out and cover-driving over the infield, inside out and finishing with a flourish
tossed up on leg, this skids on to the pad and rolls away into the off side
tapped back down the pitch to the bowler
floated up and squirted through point for one
doesn't pick this one, tossed up outside off, tries to drive and gets an inside edge past the stumps
slapped in the air short of the deep fielder
goes for the reverse sweep misses and given out lbw. The key man goes and surely England's challenge is over, looked to be adjacent to leg stump, hit halfway up the front pad
forward and blocked back to the bowler
short and wide, cut, huge bottom edge past the stumps
back and clipped through midwicket
back and cut out to deep cover
waited for in the crease and cut out to the sweeper at cover
forward and blocked into the covers
outside leg stump, stays low and Bopara goes to play to leg and gets a leading edge to the off side
bowled him! Straight threw, didn't seem to do anything at all, Bopara so out of form totally deceived, skipped past him as he looked to play to leg...I think, stayed in the crease and paid the price
bit of a slap across the line, gets two though out to the deep midwicket fence
tossed up onto leg stump, clipped down to long on
another back to leg and slap to extra cover
little short, back and cut down to long off
backing to leg again, only just keeps it out to extra cover
down the wicket and a slap down to long on, wide enough for a couple
back exposing his stumps again, gets it out to deep cover dangerous but so far so good with that shot for Patel
back of a length and cut to extra cover, only a single on the fumble
slower ball on a yorker length, well bowled, just kept out down the ground
back on his stumps and blocked into the off side, finds the gap at extra cover
full and wide, well timed but only to mid off
swinging down the leg side, fumbled by Sangakkara and they take an extra run
short and pulled to long leg too quick and takes the top edge, straight down the throat of the fielder who doesn't have to move. Four wickets for Malinga, what an effort
full and edged past square leg

tossed up outside off, well struck but in range of extra cover, who juggles but takes the catch on the rebound. Everything going right for Sri Lanka. Tried to go up and over but didn't get it above the fielder's reach and it's claimed well, first spilled above his head but turns round and takes the simple chance
off stump and clipped into the leg side
a step to leg and crashed over cow corner, caught that very nicely, bit of a drag across the line but effective
this is four more, back on his stumps and cuts from outside off stump past extra cover, poor ball, too short
back again and pulled on a couple of bounces down to long on
round the wicket, pushed across the advancing Swann who misses but Sangakkara can't take it, it was a sharp chance going well wide to his right and he couldn't take it
back and played down to long off
goes to swing it away on the leg side, misses
back away once more and slapped down to long off
played with the spin and tucked through the leg side
dragged from outside off, comes off the toe to long on
back and chopped down to long off
just outside off, on a length, guided down to fine third man
lovely, slower ball just outside off, pushed at and missed
full ball on middle stump, clipped out wide of deep midwicket
gives himself room, guided down wide of third man, helped on it's way nicely that
full ball, swiped wide of long on for four more, well struck to evade the deep fielder
well bowled, fine yorker, can only dig it out to midwicket, who comes across and saves the second
goes for the slog sweep, does he find the fielder, no it's six, big shot that
slapped through midwicket, just a single to deep cover
lifted down to long on, on the bounce, stepped to leg again
tossed up outside off, slapped down to long off, only a single
well bowled, bounces off middle stump, evades the slog sweep and the middle stump
very slow ball outside off, cracked down to long off
full just outside off, Swann goes across the stumps and clips it over the bowler's head for four
across the stumps, went to go past short fine leg, off the pads to point, just the single
full on off stump, slugged only to midwicket
full and an inside edge, Sangakkara can't gather and it's only one
steps to leg and at last Patel misses and off stump is out of the ground. A rapid full toss, missed completely and Malinga has five wickets, what a performance
great delivery, fired right up in the blockhole and just kept out back to the bowler
was heading down leg side, swung down to long leg, a misfield and they take two
beamer no ball surely, yes, went through at chest height over the stumps, just slipped out, no free hit for this though, for some ridiculous reason, silly rule that
full and straight, Swann misses again a nice little cameo but too little too late for England. Stepped to leg but a full, quick delivery finds leg stump
well bowled, gets his yorker in, dug out down the ground
slower ball, very nice, just outside off, a swing and miss from Finn
nice and full again, can only tuck into the leg side
another excellent yorker, dug into the covers
